doc.title: Back Home
doc.plot: Golnar and Golnaz are twins. Golnar has been kidnapped years before and she is not aware of her twin sister, Golnaz. She lives with a very cruel family and is suffering. One day on the way back home from school, she decides to change her route, She does not want to go the same way as her step sisters do...It is in a new street where she sees a face exactly the same as herself, she chases Golnaz and enters her house secretly, and Goes hiding under a bed, This is the time the adventure begins...
